ai-patthana21.50:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.50:0.3_0: Transmigrating for what is supremely used, made poisonous, and self-control.
ai-patthana21.50:1.1_0: (They are) unassociated with prescribed. They don’t give a teaching. They’re for those without trouble or difficulty. Their cause is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.50:2.1_0: (They are) without prescribed. They don’t give a teaching, nor for the sake of defilement. Instead, they give rise to satisfaction in the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-patthana21.50:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.50:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.50:3.1_0: For the sake of preference, etc., the preference of function, and the educating of phrases is the satisfaction in the first three ways. ...” ...
ai-patthana21.50:3.1_1: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.50:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.50:4.1_0: (The teaching is) unshakable. It is not for the sake of preservation, not for the sake of defilement, and for the sake of repulsion. It has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.50:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
